name: Critical Mass (itch) (Reien)
description:
This android mobile game is a simple 2D Space Shooter made by 2 students

The game is still in development. We are focusing on how the mechanics of the game works, not how the game plays out at the moment so if the game looks stale or boring for now, that's the reason.

Please contact me for any bugs/suggestions or write a comment.

reien1012@gmail.com
